alert.note: Alert for Dickey; Emmons; Logan; McIntosh; Sioux (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 20 at 5:52PM CST until February 22 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM CST /5 AM MST/ TUESDAY TO MIDNIGHT CST /11 PM MST/ TUESDAY NIGHT... ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE TUESDAY NIGHT THROUGH THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow and blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 3 and 5 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. For the Winter Storm Watch, blizzard conditions possible. Additional snow accumulations between 3 and 6 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Emmons, Sioux, Dickey, Logan, and McIntosh Counties. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, from 6 AM CST /5 AM MST/ Tuesday to Midnight CST /11 PM MST/ Tuesday Night. For the Winter Storm Watch, from late Tuesday night through Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Snow and widespread blowing snow will significantly reduce visibility making travel hazardous.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Prepare for possible blizzard conditions. Continue to monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
